# Theme 3

### How variation across the tree of life influences species interactions, dispersal processes and the assembly of communities influencing their ecosystem functions

```{r echo=F, results='hide'}
library(DT)
library(data.table)
publications <- fread("themes.csv")
theme3 <- subset(publications, Theme == "3")
theme3 <- theme3[, .SD, .SDcols = c(2:ncol(theme3))]

#Data links ------------------------------------------------------------------------
datalinks <- NA

for(i in 1:nrow(theme3)) {
  
  cell_link <- NA
  
  data <- theme3$Data[i]
  splitdata <- strsplit(data, split = ":&:")
  
  for(ii in 1:length(splitdata[[1]])) {
    
    name <- strsplit(splitdata[[1]][ii], split = "]")
    base <- substr(name[[1]][1], 2, nchar(name[[1]][1]))
    link <- substr(name[[1]][2], 2, (nchar(name[[1]][2])-1))
    urls <-  paste0("<a href='",  link, "'>", base, "</a>")
    
    if(ii == 1) {
      cell_link <- urls
    } else if(ii == length(splitdata[[1]])){
      cell_link <- paste0(cell_link, " and ", urls)
    } else {
      cell_link <- paste0(cell_link, ", ", urls)
    }
  }
  
  datalinks[i] <- cell_link
  
}

theme3$Data <- datalinks

#DOI -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
doilinks <- NA

for(i in 1:nrow(theme3)) {
  
  data <- theme3$DOI[i]
  splitdata <- strsplit(data, split = "]")[[1]]
  
  base <- substr(splitdata[1], 2, nchar(splitdata[1]))
  link <- substr(splitdata[2], 2, (nchar(splitdata[2])-1))
  urls <-  paste0("<a href='",  link, "'>", base, "</a>")
  
  doilinks[i] <- urls
  
}

theme3$DOI <- doilinks

#Code links ------------------------------------------------------------------------
codelinks <- NA

for(i in 1:nrow(theme3)) {
  
  cell_link <- NA
  
  data <- theme3$Code[i]
  splitdata <- strsplit(data, split = ":&:")
  
  if(length(splitdata[[1]]) == 0) {
    codelinks[i] <- NA
    
  } else {
    for(ii in 1:length(splitdata[[1]])) {
      
    name <- strsplit(splitdata[[1]][ii], split = "]")
    base <- substr(name[[1]][1], 2, nchar(name[[1]][1]))
    link <- substr(name[[1]][2], 2, (nchar(name[[1]][2])-1))
    urls <-  paste0("<a href='",  link, "'>", base, "</a>")
    
    if(ii == 1) {
      cell_link <- urls
    } else if(ii == length(splitdata[[1]])){
      cell_link <- paste0(cell_link, " and ", urls)
    } else {
      cell_link <- paste0(cell_link, ", ", urls)
    }
    
  }
  codelinks[i] <- cell_link
  }
}

theme3$Code <- codelinks
```
